alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Cheshire; Hillsborough; Merrimack; Rockingham (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 16 at 2:14PM EDT until July 16 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR WEST CENTRAL BELKNAP, MERRIMACK, NORTHEASTERN CHESHIRE, HILLSBOROUGH AND WESTERN ROCKINGHAM COUNTIES... At 214 PM EDT, Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen across the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. Local Officials in Alton have reported severe flooding and have advised people to stay off the roads. Several nearby communities observed similar rainfall so severe impacts are likely impacting other areas. Please report flooding to local officials. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Alton, Manchester, Nashua, Concord, Derry, Merrimack, Franklin, Henniker, Northwood and Salem. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Life Threatening flooding is occurring. Take action NOW to move to higher ground! If trapped, do not attempt to cross fast moving water. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
